overview: When a young gay couple discovers that one of them has been declared dead by mistake, rather than reporting the error they decide to fake a funeral and flee the country with the money instead. After staging a failure of a funeral cover up, and bribing a doctor they soon learn there was more than a clerical mistake, and there is in fact a body in the casket. Now on the run the pair find the tensions in their own relationship rise, and one has to prove their dedication to their relationship in a final sacrifice.
title: Six Feet Over
